title: Slow-plan latency thresholds shipped
summary: Receipts hygiene now emits warn/fail alerts and autonomy latency mirrors the severity on the bus.
actions: Added warn/fail thresholds with severity tagging, extended autonomy latency/batch refinement wiring, updated automation docs, and logged bus receipts.
notes: Defaults: warn=259200s, fail=604800s. Future work: surface thresholds in batch summary dashboards.
